volumio_info.details:
This Plugin has been sponsored by JustBoom and it works out of the box with JustBoom IR Remote

FEATURES:

  • Profiles available: JustBoom IR Remote, Odroid Remote, Apple remote and more
  • Controls: Play, pause, mute, volume, next, previous, seek, repeat and random
volumio_info.changelog: Added switch to show/hide advanced parameters for GPIO configuration; added configuration files for "Aiyima T9 Pro"; corrected typo in "lircrc" for "Technics RAK-SL948WK"
